title: 2 arrested after child shot in Sanford
content:
SANFORD, Fla. —
A man and woman face child neglect charges after investigators say a child was shot inside a garage in Sanford.
Aaron Davis, 26, and Devolia Sims, 23, both of Sanford, are charged with child neglect with great bodily harm, according to the Sanford Police Department.
Investigators said the pair drove the child to Central Florida Regional Hospital for treatment of a gunshot wound to the hand Tuesday, and hospital staff contacted authorities.
Police interviewed Sims, who they said repeatedly changed her story. Davis refused to give a statement, officers said.
After speaking with family members, investigators determined the shooting happened at Davis’ home, in his garage.
Police said they found garbage, drug paraphernalia, gun magazines and ammo strewn across the garage floor. Investigators said all of the items would be easily accessible to an unattended child.
Davis and Sims were booked into the Seminole County jail.
